Safaa Abdallah Mohammed El Tokhi (amụrụ na 22 Ọgọst 1964), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Safaa El-Toukhi, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Hunter, Gunshot na Kafr Delhab
A mụrụ ya na 22 Ọgọstụ 1964 na Cairo, Egypt

Nna ya Abdallah Al-Toukhi bụ onye na-ede egwuregwu nke amụrụ na 18 Ọgọst 1926 wee nwụọ na 26 Febụwarị 2001 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na anọ. Nne ya Fathia al-Assal bụ onye edemede egwuregwu Egypt a ma ama na onye na-eme ihe ike
A mụrụ Fathia na 20 Febụwarị 1933, o wee nwụọ na 15 June 2014 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na otu na-esote nsogbu ahụike a na-akọwaghị akọwa.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Higher Institute of Dramatic Arts na 1985
Na mbido, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede, nke nne ya metụtara
N'afọ 1995, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Institute of National Culture
Safaa malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na 1979 na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn El Bahitha
Ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri naanị n'otu egwuregwu El Ayyam El Makhmoura mere na 1999
Mgbe ahụ ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, dị ka El Zaman El Saaʹb, El Mohagir, na Bekhit we Adila
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ na-achịkwa ihe nkiri telivishọn, ebe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri: Leyali El Hulmiyya, Lan Ayesh Fi Galbab Abi, Mahmoud El Masry
Ihe ngosi telivishọn ya kachasị ama ama sitere na usoro Qadhiya Raizá ŌAm na ọrụ 'Yousra'.
